backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing a multi-game-mode ICP trading game with account management, leveraged positions (long/short with liquidation), leaderboards, winners tracking, access control, and Kong Swap API integration for ICP price fetching.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting three high-confidence features: replacing candlestick charts with line charts, updating the price data hook to fetch simple price points from Kong Swap API, and integrating Kong Swap trading metrics and tools into the frontend.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend files including components (PriceChart, TradingPanel, Portfolio, Leaderboard, Positions), hooks (useICPPriceData, useTradingActions, usePortfolio), contexts (GameModeContext), and styling configuration.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS styles defining OKLCH color system variables for light and dark themes with a dark trading aesthetic featuring emerald/teal accents for gains and red for losses.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the ICP Trading Game React application with root div and module script reference to main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main application component managing Internet Identity authentication, game mode context, and tabbed navigation between trading (with TradingMetrics), positions, portfolio, and leaderboard views with header and game mode selector.
frontend/src/components/GameModeSelector: Component rendering four buttons (24h, 7d, 30d, 1y) for selecting game modes with active state styling using the GameModeContext.
frontend/src/components/GameTimer.tsx: Countdown timer component displaying days, hours, minutes, and seconds until the next game mode reset using the useGameTimer hook with formatted monospace display.
frontend/src/components/Leaderboard.tsx: Displays a ranked leaderboard of traders by profit/loss for the selected game mode (daily/weekly/monthly/yearly), showing portfolio values, P&L percentages, and trophy icons for top three positions.
frontend/src/components/Portfolio.tsx: Shows user's portfolio overview with cards displaying cash balance, ICP holdings, margin locked, unrealized P&L, total portfolio value, and realized P&L; includes admin-only reset account functionality.
frontend/src/components/Positions.tsx: Displays a table of active leveraged positions (long/short) with details like entry price, current price, margin, unrealized P&L, liquidation price, and close position buttons.
frontend/src/components/PriceChart.tsx: Renders an interactive ICP price chart with multiple timeframes (24H to 180D), displays price changes, margin statistics overlay, and reference lines for liquidation prices of open positions.
frontend/src/components/TradingMetrics.t: Shows Kong Swap trading metrics in tabbed interface including technical indicators (RSI, volatility, moving averages), volume charts, liquidity data, and order book visualization.
frontend/src/components/TradingPanel.tsx: Trading panel component with tabs for spot trading (buy/sell ICP) and leveraged trading (long/short positions). Supports ICP and dollar input modes with max balance buttons and leverage selection from 2x to 20x.
frontend/src/components/WinnersSection.t: Displays a table of past winners for the selected game mode, showing winner profiles, final portfolio values, profit/loss percentages, and timestamps. Fetches user profiles and sorts winners by most recent.
frontend/src/contexts/GameModeContext.ts: React context provider for managing game mode state (daily/weekly/monthly/yearly) with localStorage persistence. Provides gameMode and setGameMode to child components.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance with authentication via Internet Identity. Invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes and initializes access control with admin token.
frontend/src/hooks/useGameTimer.ts: Hook that calculates and updates time remaining until the next game reset based on game mode (daily/weekly/monthly/yearly). Returns days, hours, minutes, seconds, and totalSeconds with automatic recalculation on expiry.
frontend/src/hooks/useICPPriceData.ts: Provides hooks for fetching current ICP price and historical price data from Kong Swap API with fallbacks. Includes synthetic data generation when API is unavailable, with configurable intervals based on timeframe.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login/logout flow, identity persistence, and auth client creation. Provides identity state, login status, and authentication methods to components.
frontend/src/hooks/useKongSwapMetrics.ts: React Query hook that fetches KongSwap metrics (volume, liquidity, order book, technical indicators) from external API endpoints, with fallback to synthetic data generation on error.
frontend/src/hooks/useLeaderboard.ts: React Query hook that fetches and calculates leaderboard entries by combining account data with current ICP price, sorting players by total portfolio value.
frontend/src/hooks/useLeverageActions.ts: Provides mutations for opening long/short leveraged positions and closing positions, with automatic query invalidation and toast notifications.
frontend/src/hooks/usePortfolio.ts: React Query hook that calculates comprehensive portfolio metrics including cash, ICP holdings, margin locked, unrealized P&L, and total value by combining account data with positions.
frontend/src/hooks/usePositions.ts: React Query hook that fetches open leveraged positions and calculates unrealized P&L for each position based on current ICP price.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching leaderboard data and checking admin status from the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useTradingActions.ts: Provides functions for buying/selling ICP and resetting accounts, with loading states, error handling, toast notifications, and query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useWinners.ts: React Query hook that fetches the list of winners for a specific game mode from the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark theme colors, including chart colors and design tokens.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query and Internet Identity providers, then renders the root App component.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, storing, and managing URL parameters from both regular query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support and functions to clear parameters from URLs.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color schemes using OKLCH color space, typography settings with Inter and JetBrains Mono fonts, container queries, animations, and design tokens for a component library.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing an ICP trading simulator with multiple game modes, leveraged trading, leaderboards, and Kong Swap API integration; documents known issues with buy transactions, ICP calculations, and candlestick chart rendering.
